actions: Clears Heat and drains Fire from the Yang Ming/Qi Level.
Settles anxiety, calms the Spirit, calms the Liver and anchors and preserves Floating Yang.
Extinguishes Wind, alleviates spasms, drains Liver Heat, pacifies Liver Yang and-releases the Exterior.
Opens the Orifices, vaporizes Phlegm, removes filth, calms the Spirit and disperses Wind.
Drains Heat, reduces Fire toxicity, purges accumulations, drains Fire, drains Heat from the Blood, activates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, and eliminates Phlegm.
With Huang Lian, for distention, Heart palpitations, mental distress with facial congestion, and epilepsy due to Excess Heat.
Clears and transforms Phlegm-Heat, clears Heat, cools the Heart and settles convulsions and tremors.
Drains Fire, detoxifies and calms ascending Liver Yang.
Disperses Wind-Heat, cools and clears the head and eyes, benefits the throat and relieves Stagnation of Liver Qi.
With Gou Teng, prevents convulsions in febrile children.
Drains Fire, resolves Fire toxicity and clears Heart and Stomach Fire.

With Huang Qi, drains pathogenic Heat from the Upper and Middle Jiaos for high fever, redness, swelling and pain of the head and face, dry mouth, parched throat, ulcerations of the mouth and tongue, epistaxis, rashes and irritability in warm-febrile disease.
Drains Liver Heat, calms the Liver, anchors Yang, extinguishes Wind, controls spasms and convulsions, drains Heat and clears Fire toxicity.
Clears Heat, relieves toxicity, dislodges Phlegm, opens the Orifices, calms the Shen and resuscitates.

syndromes: Phlegm Obstructs the Heart Orifice: Yang Obstruction

symptoms: Sudden collapse with loss of consciousness

notes: Dissolve 1 bolus of An Gong Niu Huang Wan and take along with the formula.
